text:
I'm using Apache JMeter to monitoring a JBoss 4.0 Server, the graph is OK, but the saved XML is made in a wrong way, with a line in csv format and part in XML without an schema.

Also if possible made it easiest to open and match columns in a Excel Sheet.
creator: david.garcia.alonso@alumnos.uva.es

text:
It looks like you have used the same output file name for both the Monitor output and the sampler output, with the latter in CSV format.

Please check your test plan for other Listeners using the same file name.
Also if you are using the -l flag (or jmeter-n.bat) note that this will create a listener.

Please open a separate issue for any enhancements.
creator: sebb@apache.org
